txt.en:
'In the northern reaches of the Ashenslades, the forces of Dol Guldur have established a camp among a series of ruins they call Garmadh-maudhûl. This camp has begun to deploy scouts to warn of incursions from forces assaulting Southern Mirkwood. 

'Will you travel to Garmadh-maudhûl and dispatch the scouts on the outskirts of the encampment? Garmadh-maudhûl can be found to the north-east by following the trail that traverses up the mountain.

'When the forward scouts have been defeated, return to me with your report.'
'I commend you on the successful execution of your duty. Your victory will make our next task easier to accomplish.'
'Defeat the enemy scouts that have been sighted along the outskirts of Garmadh-maudhûl. They present a significant threat to our forces.'
A number of enemy scouts have been sighted along the outskirts of Garmadh-maudhûl, watching for signs of approaching danger.

Garmadh-maudhûl can be found to the north-east of Mithechad by following a trail that traverses up the mountain.\n\nEirien has asked you to defeat any scouts that you encounter in the area surrounding Garmadh-maudhûl.
Einior is at Mithechad, south-west of Garmadh-maudhûl.\n\nYou should return to Eirien and inform her of your deed.
